title: Startup Founders Podcast, Mexico City Edition – Itzel Lerma & Paulina Arreola, 500 Startups
content: In my latest Mexico City interview, I sit down with Itzel Lerma and Paulina Arreola, members of 500's Mexico team! They talk about some of the challenges and opportunities for entrepreneurs in Mexico and Latin America. Listen now: iTunes Stream the episodes on Stitcher RSS Feed Please remember so rate the show on iTunes and Stitcher, and to send questions/feedback to @markjsaldana on Twitter! I'll have another founder interview for you this Friday.
